item.title: Minercraft beta 1.7.3 Ulicesnsed Copy :(?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:5, topic:405180”][quote author=Ⅽole link=topic=502176.msg3679772#msg3679772 date=1311455307]

buy minecraft and it will go away

I bought it and still get the Unregistered Derpcraft please herp and durr.com
[/quote]

sucks to be you[/quote]
No, it sucks because Notch is an idiot lol. He doesn’t know how to filter. He could easily just add in a script to the client. The script itself, is as simple as this. Yes I know this code is sloppy but I wrote it off the top of my head.

import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;

public class NameTest {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
			testName(args[i]);
		}
	}
	
	public static void testName(String name) {
		try {
			URL oracle = new URL("http://minecraft.net/haspaid.jsp?user=" + name);
			BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(
			new InputStreamReader(
			oracle.openStream()));
			String inputLine;
			while ((inputLine = in.readLine()) != null) {
				if (inputLine.length() > 1) {
					System.out.println("Name Tested: " + name + "       Paid? " + inputLine);
				}
			}
			in.close();
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
	}

}
